languages.text: "Не надо скрытничать. Пусть он{mf||а} понимает". {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Херетек{/g} с улыбкой кивает в вашу сторону.{/n}

languages.text: 「秘密裏にする必要はない。{mf|彼|彼女}にも理解させよ」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}異端技術{/g}はあなたの方を向いて頷き、微笑む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for secrecy. Let {mf|him|her} understand." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} nods in your direction with a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「秘密裏にする必要はない。{mf|彼|彼女}にも理解させよ」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}異端技術{/g}はあなたの方を向いて頷き、微笑む。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: “没必要这么偷偷摸摸，和{mf|他|她}直说了吧。”{n}眼前的{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}异教{/g}成员微笑着，朝你的方向点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for secrecy. Let {mf|him|her} understand." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} nods in your direction with a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没必要这么偷偷摸摸，和{mf|他|她}直说了吧。”{n}眼前的{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}异教{/g}成员微笑着，朝你的方向点了点头。{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Es ist keine Geheimniskrämerei nötig. Lasst {mf|ihn|sie} teilhaben." {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Häretekt{/g} nickt lächelnd in deine Richtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for secrecy. Let {mf|him|her} understand." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} nods in your direction with a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es besteht kein Grund zur Geheimniskrämerei. Lasst {mf|ihn|sie} teilhaben." {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Häretekt{/g} nickt lächelnd in deine Richtung.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: « Inutile de faire des cachotteries. Autant qu'{mf|il|elle} sache à quoi s'en tenir. » {n}Le sourire aux lèvres, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}hérétek{/g} vous désigne d'un signe de tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for secrecy. Let {mf|him|her} understand." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} nods in your direction with a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de faire des cachotteries. Autant qu'{mf|il|elle} sache à quoi s'en tenir. » {n}Le sourire aux lèvres, l'{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}hérétek{/g} vous désigne d'un signe de tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: «El secretismo está de más. Hable de modo que {mf|él|ella} le entienda». {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} te señala con un gesto de la cabeza y una sonrisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for secrecy. Let {mf|him|her} understand." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} nods in your direction with a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La discreción está de más. Hable de modo que {mf|él|ella} le entienda». {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} te señala con un gesto de la cabeza y una sonrisa.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: "Gizliliğe gerek yok. O da anlasın." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Tekâfir{/g}, gülümseyip başıyla seni işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "There is no need for secrecy. Let {mf|him|her} understand." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g} nods in your direction with a smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gizliliğe gerek yok. O da anlasın." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Tekâfir{/g} gülümsüyor ve başıyla seni işaret ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
